channel.title: GER:MBG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mercedes CEO Källenius on the New G-Wagon Cabriolet
item.description: Ola Källenius, chief executive officer of Mercedes-Benz Group AG, discusses the return of the G-Class cabriolet, the convertible version of its six-figure SUV. (Source: Bloomberg)
